00149         {

00151                         {
00152                             $action = $_GET["action"];
00153                         
00154                             if ($action == "edit")
00155                             {
00156                               // GET RES ID and RES TYPE
00157                               $resource_id = $_GET["id"];
00158                               $resource_type = $_GET["res_type"];
00159                             }
00160                             
00161                             if ($action == "add")
00162                         {
00163                                 // RESET RES ID and RES TYPE
00164                                 $resource_id = NULL;
00165                                 $resource_type = NULL;
00166                         }
00167                         }
00168                         
00169                         //if selector was pressed
00170                         if(isset($_POST["add_res_type"]))
00171                         {
00172                                 $resource_type = $_POST["add_res_type"];
00173                                 $action = $_POST["action"];
00174                         }
00175                                 
00176                         //if push in add/edit was pressed
00177                         if(isset($_POST["push"]))
00178                         {
00179                                 $action = $_POST["push"];
00180                                 $resource_type = $_POST["res_type"];
00181                                 $resource_id= $_POST["add_res_id"];
00182                         }
00183                         
00184                         Controller::check($_POST["page"], $action, $resource_type, $resource_id);
00185                         
00186           }

00188             Controller::check("home", NULL, NULL, NULL);
